text: Timothy Kevin Story (born March 13, 1970) is an American director, producer and writer. He is known for directing comedy movies such as Ride Along, Barbershop, Think Like a Man and he also directed the comic book movie Fantastic Four. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles
title: Tim Story
